guildMemberAdd.setDescription: Thank you for joining our server

addFields.name: Rules
addFields.value: Please read our [rules](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/code-of-conduct/) before posting in the server.

messageDelete.setDescription: Here are the details of that message.

message.warnFileUpload: Please do not upload any files other than images or videos. For large blocks of code, use CodePen or PasteBin.
message.commandExecutionError: There was an error trying to execute that command!

close.description: Closes the channel. This command requires admin privileges, and will only work on the automatically created 'suspended' channels. Mentioning user with the command will remove the suspended role from the user.

responses.incorrectPermission: $$$ did not have the correct permissions.
responses.appealApproved: The appeal was approved and $$$'s access was restored.

embed.setDescription: $$$ has closed and deleted the \`$$$\` channel
